about.headline: Homewood Suites Memphis Germantown
content: Homewood Suites is close to the interstate and offers easy access to the best of Memphis. It boasts fully-furnished kitchens, a 24-hour fitness center, and a complimentary evening social on weeknights. Located in Germantown, Tennessee provides complimentary shuttle service within an 8-kilometer radius of Memphis International Airport.
The Homewood Suites is 29 km from Graceland. The Memphis Zoo is 20.9 km distant, while the hotel is 32.2 km from downtown Memphis.

room.headline: Rooms & Suites are Packed with Top-notch Amenities
content: Homewood Suites provides a complimentary daily breakfast. Guests can enjoy an outdoor pool and a spacious grill area. Homewood Suites by Hilton Memphis, Germantown, is pet-friendly and welcomes furry friends. Every suite also has Serta Suite Dreams(R) bedding for comfortable sleep, flat TV, and free Wi-Fi. Each suite also includes a microwave, refrigerator, and coffee machine.
